Package com.flipkart.business

Interface FlipFitGymOwnerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitGymOwnerService
public interface FlipFitGymOwnerInterface
Interface defining the operations that can be performed by a gym owner in the FlipFit system. This includes managing gym profiles, adding or modifying gyms, managing slots, and viewing bookings.

  • Method Details

    • createProfile

      void createProfile(String username, String password, String name, String address, String phoneNumber, String gstNumber, String panCardNumber) throws ExistingUserException
      Creates a new gym owner profile.
      Parameters:
      username - the username for the new gym owner
      password - the password for the new gym owner
      name - the name of the new gym owner
      address - the address of the new gym owner
      phoneNumber - the phone number of the new gym owner
      gstNumber - the GST number of the new gym owner
      panCardNumber - the PAN card number of the new gym owner
      Throws:
      ExistingUserException - if a user with the same username already exists

    • editProfile

      void editProfile(String gymOwnerId, String address, String gstNumber, String panCardNumber) throws InvalidUserException
      Edits an existing gym owner profile.
      Parameters:
      gymOwnerId - the unique identifier of the gym owner whose profile is to be edited
      address - the updated address of the gym owner
      gstNumber - the updated GST number of the gym owner
      panCardNumber - the updated PAN card number of the gym owner
      Throws:
      InvalidUserException - if the gym owner ID is invalid or if the operation fails

    • addGym

      void addGym(String centreName, String centreAddress, String gymOwnerId)
      Adds a new gym to the system.
      Parameters:
      centreName - the name of the new gym
      centreAddress - the address of the new gym
      gymOwnerId - the ID of the gym owner adding the gym

    • removeGym

      void removeGym(String gymOwnerId, String centreId) throws UnauthorizedGymOwnerException
      Removes an existing gym from the system.
      Parameters:
      gymOwnerId - the ID of the gym owner requesting the removal
      centreId - the ID of the gym to be removed
      Throws:
      UnauthorizedGymOwnerException - if the gym owner is not authorized to remove the gym

    • modifyGym

      boolean modifyGym(String gymOwnerId, String centreId, String gymName, String gymAddress) throws UnauthorizedGymOwnerException
      Modifies the details of an existing gym.
      Parameters:
      gymOwnerId - the ID of the gym owner requesting the modification
      centreId - the ID of the gym to be modified
      gymName - the new name for the gym
      gymAddress - the new address for the gym
      Returns:
      true if the modification is successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      UnauthorizedGymOwnerException - if the gym owner is not authorized to modify the gym

    • viewRegisteredGymCenters

      List<FlipFitCentre> viewRegisteredGymCenters(String userId)
      Views all registered gym centers for a given user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose gym centers are to be viewed
      Returns:
      a list of registered gym centers

    • addSlot

      void addSlot(String centreId, LocalTime startTime, Integer noOfSeats) throws GymSlotAlreadyExistsException
      Adds a new slot to a gym.
      Parameters:
      centreId - the ID of the gym where the slot is to be added
      startTime - the start time of the new slot
      noOfSeats - the number of seats available in the new slot
      Throws:
      GymSlotAlreadyExistsException - if a slot with the same start time already exists in the gym

    • removeSlot

      void removeSlot(String slotId) throws InvalidSlotException
      Removes an existing slot from a gym.
      Parameters:
      slotId - the ID of the slot to be removed
      Throws:
      InvalidSlotException - if the slot ID is invalid or if the operation fails

    • updateSlot

      void updateSlot(String centreId, LocalTime startTime, Integer noOfSeats) throws InvalidSlotException
      Updates the details of an existing slot.
      Parameters:
      centreId - the ID of the gym where the slot is located
      startTime - the new start time for the slot
      noOfSeats - the new number of seats for the slot
      Throws:
      InvalidSlotException - if the slot is invalid or if the operation fails

    • viewAllSlots

      List<FlipFitCenterSlot> viewAllSlots(String centreId)
      Views all slots for a given gym center.
      Parameters:
      centreId - the ID of the gym center whose slots are to be viewed
      Returns:
      a list of all slots for the specified gym center

    • viewAvailableSlots

      List<FlipFitCenterSlot> viewAvailableSlots(String gymId, LocalDate date)
      Views available slots for a given gym on a specific date.
      Parameters:
      gymId - the ID of the gym whose slots are to be viewed
      date - the date for which available slots are to be viewed
      Returns:
      a list of available slots for the specified gym on the specified date

    • viewAllBookingsByGymIdAndDate

      List<FlipFitSlotBooking> viewAllBookingsByGymIdAndDate(String gymId, LocalDate date)
      Views all bookings for a given gym on a specific date.
      Parameters:
      gymId - the ID of the gym whose bookings are to be viewed
      date - the date for which bookings are to be viewed
      Returns:
      a list of all bookings for the specified gym on the specified date
